name: Chester One
description: A love letter to classic platforming action and 90s animation oddness! Eat magical candies to change the art of the world around you as you fight through 40 levels unlocking new Chesters, battling strange baddies, finding secret secrets, and reclaiming your cupcakes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
